select_codebook.title: Choose a code-frame
select_codebook.subtitle: We will then show you how it applies to your data

templates.loading_failed: An error occurred while loading the templates, please try again later. Sorry for that, we're looking into it.
templates.info: Choose a template as basis for your code-frame. You can customize it in the next step.

keywords.loading_failed: An error occurred while generating keywords, please try again later. Sorry for that, we're looking into it.

empty_codebook.title: Empty codebook
empty_codebook.subtitle: Create new codes from the generated keywords

keywords.max_codes_reached: Currently a maximum of {allowed} codes are supported. Please contact support if you require more.

k2c.label: New code name
k2c.label_invalid: Code-Name must be at least {n_chars} characters
k2c.category_invalid: Category must be at least {n_chars} characters

keywords.info:
Use the keywords to customize your codebook. Experiment and see how adding or editing codes influences the sample.
Fine tune the codebook after hitting save, where you will have the options to merge, bulk delete etc.

coded_sample.loading: Applying codebook to a sample of your data
coded_sample.failed: An error occurred while coding a sample of your data. Please try again. If the error persists, contact support.
coded_sample.no_matches: For the sample of responses we took, no codes of this template could be matched.
coded_sample.not_customized: Create new codes from the keywords to see how they are applied to your responses.
coded_sample.is_dirty: Your codebook has changed since the last update. Click the refresh sample button to get an updated sample.
coded_sample.empty_codebook: Create codes first to see how they apply to your data.

completed.title: The new codebook and predictions for the samples have been assigned.

step_refine.title: Suggestions for all responses
step_refine.description: Predictions on your entire dataset have been requested, they will arrive in a couple of minutes.

step_review.title: Review responses & add codes
step_review.description: Help the model understand your data better, by assigning missing codes or creating new codes where necessary.

step_done.title: Quality check & download
step_done.description: Jump towards the end of your dataset and check the quality of the predictions. If you're satisfied, download the results and reap the sweet fruit of your hard work. üçéüçä
